title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Meriwether Lewis Monument, Tennessee
body: Ranger-Led Activities and Events in the Meriwether Lewis Area         Visitors join a ranger at the annual Meriwether Lewis Craft Fair. NPS Image  You may chose to join a park ranger and explore parts of the original Trace, or learn more about Meriwether Lewis.  Ranger programs are always free; schedules and topics vary by season. Please call 1-800-305-7417 for more information on ranger-led activities.
